prefercite.head: Preferred Citation
prefercite.p: Robert W. Bolling Scrapbook, Accession # mss00459, Virginia Military Institute Archives

scopecontent.head: Scope and Content
scopecontent.p: Scrapbook compiled by Cadet Robert W. Bolling (1899-1969), Virginia Military Institute Class of 1922. Included are snapshots, dance programs, clippings, drawings, and other VMI memorabilia. Topics of the photographs include his classmates and friends, cadet life, athletics, and VMI buildings.
